content: this is a summary of a legal text regarding a court decision made by the district court in ljubljana the court case involved the division of goods with a total value of 280000 euros between two heirs both sons of the deceased originally the goods were supposed to be divided equally but an agreement was reached to make adjustments heir 1 will receive half of the real estate funds in the bank account and unpaid pension benefits while heir 2 will receive the other half of the real estate the court decision was based on the inheritance act specifically article 11 the court also mentioned that the sale of the real estate will cover operating costs and taxes the court received a request from one of the heirs to open probate proceedings and the heirs agreed to waive the probate hearing the court made an order for the succession without a hearing and determined the value of the estate to be 277000 eur the court levied a fee of 1008 eur based on the value of the estate the court explained the right to appeal the order of succession and provided instructions on how to lodge an appeal the appellant has 15 days to lodge an appeal with the court providing enough copies of the appeal and stating the grounds for the appeal the appeal must be comprehensible and may be dismissed if it lacks necessary information the appeal must be lodged by a lawyer and the court fee must be paid the text is dated november 10 2021 in ljubljana
